thread.title: Winnipeg man charged after child porn videos found - Winnipeg Free Press
thread.title_full: Winnipeg man charged after child porn videos found - Winnipeg Free Press

author: winnipegfreepress.com
title: Winnipeg man charged after child porn videos found - Winnipeg Free Press
text:
Police have charged a 20-year-old Winnipeg man with accessing and possessing child pornography after videos of girls aged three to seven performing "sexual abusive acts" were found on his laptop.
Police are still investigating the origins of the videos, and so far do not know where they were made or where the victims come from, said Michalyshen. The man has not been charged with any involvement in making the videos.
Michalyshen said the suspect brought his laptop computer to a computer repair business located on Century Street.
"While technicians began running a restoration on the computer, child sexual abuse videos were observed," he said. "Members of the Internet Child Exploitation (ICE) Unit were notified and continued the investigation. A search warrant was applied for and granted"
The man was arrested Thursday morning.
